name: Lights Out (itch) (Unholy Cathar)
description:
"That son of mine hasn't learned how to turn off the lights when he leaves a room yet. He'll run me out of house and home with this energy bill!"

----

Controls:

A/D - Move left and Right

Click on objects to flip them On/Off

-----

Submission for the WastedResources game jam. The theme was "Save your Energy"

And we sadly had no energy left at 4AM submission day, so this is more a proof of concept where you can only lose. We might add more to this to make it a full game as we initially intended it to be but for now enjoy!

Credits:

Programmers: Hambagman, Me

Art: Me

Sound: Hambagman, Adam

Honorable Mentions: Reilly, Jhamez, Lio
